name: Timmy the Toaster
description:
Timmy the Toaster You have a PET toaster?? - Your Confused Friend

You have a pet toaster now! Make sure to pet it a lot.

This game was made for the 2022 Virtual Pet Jam.

(Note: Apologies if there's some audio popping, it seems to be a Godot bug when exporting to HTML5. If you have a solution let me know!)

Attribution

Art - Font, Palette

Music - Radley Baker

SFX - Zap, Toaster, Game Over, Purchase
